Interface Spintronic3DViewer

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaFXSpintronic3DViewer, Jzy3dSpintronic3DViewer
public interface Spintronic3DViewer
Abstract interface for 3D spintronic structure visualization. Supports multiple backends (JavaFX 3D, Jzy3d).
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addLayer(double y, double thickness, String color, String label)
    Adds a ferromagnetic layer to the scene.

    Adds a magnetization arrow at given position.

    Adds a spin current flow visualization (arrow field).

  • Method Details

    • addLayer

      void addLayer(double y, double thickness, String color, String label)
      Adds a ferromagnetic layer to the scene.
      Parameters:
      y - Y position (vertical stack)
      thickness - Layer thickness (for display scaling)
      color - Color hex string (e.g., "#34495e")
      label - Layer name

    • addMagnetizationArrow

      void addMagnetizationArrow(double x, double y, double z, Real mx, Real my, Real mz, String id)
      Adds a magnetization arrow at given position.
      Parameters:
      x - X position
      y - Y position
      z - Z position
      mx - Magnetization X component
      my - Magnetization Y component
      mz - Magnetization Z component
      id - Unique ID for updates

    • updateMagnetizationArrow

      void updateMagnetizationArrow(String id, Real mx, Real my, Real mz)
      Updates an existing magnetization arrow.

    • addSpinCurrentFlow

      void addSpinCurrentFlow(double fromY, double toY, int density)
      Adds a spin current flow visualization (arrow field).

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears the scene.

    • getComponent

      Object getComponent()
      Gets the renderable component (JavaFX Node, AWT Component, etc.)

    • setViewAngle

      void setViewAngle(double azimuth, double elevation)
      Sets the view angle.
